But one of the coolest things about, when I got logged on as me, it had access to EVERY cd I have ever ordered from amazon. Very impressive product.

review: I found that it cut out half way into a movie, I had to turn my TV off and back on to finish watching the movie.  I tried the stick for a week before returning it to Best Buy and purchasing the Apple TV.  I find it works much nicer, easier to navigate, can watch movies without having any buffering (*like the chromcast) or cutting out like the stick... and more I can listen to my iTunes on my surround sound! :)  Hope the stick works for you better than it did me!

review: It works great. The hand control is a bit too cheap but it does work well.
author: Richard G. Snell

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is really great! The way it handles Amazon content is fantastic. It pre-loads the content in your watch lists so that no buffering is necessary. This is a life saver on slow DSL. The third party apps are great too but the Amazon Content definitely shines the brightest! This is the perfect streaming accessory for almost everyone, and a game changer for those who subscribe to Amazon prime. I would rather watch on this Fire TV than my Apple TV, XBOX One, or Macbook. It handles content brilliantly.
author: Suzannah Davis
